text: Haloterrigena longa is a species of archaea in the family Halobacteriaceae. It was isolated from Aibi Salt Lake in Xinjiang, China in 2006. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Haloterrigena longa at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Halobacteria
title: Haloterrigena longa
